definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
citric acid cycle/Krebs cycle/tricarboxylic acid cycle

sentences.english: The leach aiding effect and action mechanism of leach aid agent citric acid are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助浸劑檸檬酸的助浸效果及其作用機理。

sentences.english: The citric acid contained in these beverages also causes dental erosion.
sentences.chinese: 這些飲料中所含的檸檬酸也會導致牙酸蝕病。

sentences.english: The citrate method was adopted to prepare LiNbO3 ferroelectric film.
sentences.chinese: 採用檸檬酸鹽法制備鈮酸鋰鐵電薄膜。

sentences.english: The aluminium citrate could strongly inhibit the adsorptive activity of quartz.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬酸鋁具有拮抗石英吸附膜蛋白的作用。

sentences.english: In a glass bowl, mix the citric acid and bicarbonate of soda together.
sentences.chinese: 在玻璃碗內加入檸檬酸粉和小蘇打粉混合。

sentences.english: Tributyl citrate is a new material of non-toxic plasticizer.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬酸三丁酯是一種新型無毒增塑劑。

sentences.english: The result showed that citric acid and vitamin C had a better fresh-keeping effect.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，檸檬酸和抗壞血酸的保鮮效果較好。

sentences.english: Study after study shows the correlation between citric acid deficiency and chronic fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明檸檬酸攝取不足與慢性疲勞有聯繫。

sentences.english: Potassium Citrate is a well absorbed and highly bioavailable form of potassium.
sentences.chinese: 鉀檸檬酸鉀的吸收，高生物活性好形式。

sentences.english: Process of Pd plating from system of potassium citrate and ammonium oxalate is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究在檸檬酸鉀和草酸銨鍍液體系中鍍鈀工藝。

sentences.english: Potassium citrate is also added for optimal osteo support.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬酸鉀，也增加了對骨的最佳支持。

sentences.english: In this sense, it is similar to sodium citrate.
sentences.chinese: 從這個意義上講，它類似於檸檬酸鈉。

sentences.english: Repeat for several days until the acids in the lemon juice dissolve the wart completely.
sentences.chinese: 幾天之後檸檬汁中的檸檬酸就可以完全分解疣。

sentences.english: In the paper the nonaqueous titration is used to determine potassium citrate content .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了採用非水滴定測定檸檬酸鉀含量的分析方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, is discussed the finishing effect of real silk fabric with citric acid and chitin.
sentences.chinese: 文章討論了檸檬酸和殼聚糖對真絲綢防皺整理的效果。

sentences.english: The synthesis of monoglyceride citrates catalyzed by lipase in organic medium was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 以脂肪酶爲催化劑，在有機介質中合成檸檬酸甘油酯。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
